Hero.subtitle: I'm Yamine Daroueche, a French front-end Web developer.

text.part1: I'm an enthusiastic web developer, motivated and determined to bring value to the people I work with.
text.part2: Currently studying Computer Science in a Bachelor's Degree at the University of Limoges, I decided to specialise myself in JavaScript Web development.

description.part1: Scenario (fictional): Sportify is a gym in Limoges with several locations, where different courses (pilates, cycling, etc.) are available for the public.
description.part2: Visit the website, and tell me if you have any feedback or suggestion, I'll happily take them ! üòÅ However, I haven't finished the mobile version.
description.part3: P.S. : I developed this website with 2 university classmates. I genuinely thank them for their precious help.

description.part1: I'm currently working on a new version of the website of AS Panazol, a french semi-pro a football club.
